    Algorithm_NQueen

    less than 1 minute read

    Queen 숫자를 입력받으면 조건에 맞는 각각의 위치를 반환하는 프로그램입니다.

    
#!/usr/bin/env python
# coding: utf-8

# In[1]:


def nqueen(sol, N): 
    global count 
    if len(sol) == N:
        count += 1 
        print(count, sol) 
        return 0 
    
    candidate = list(range(N)) 
    for i in range(len(sol)): 
        if sol[i] in candidate:
            candidate.remove(sol[i])
        distance = len(sol) - i 
        if sol[i] + distance in candidate:
            candidate.remove(sol[i] + distance) 
        if sol[i] - distance in candidate:
            candidate.remove(sol[i] - distance) 
    if candidate != []: 
        for i in candidate: 
            sol.append(i)
            nqueen(sol, N) 
            sol.pop() 
    else: 
        return 0 

count = 0 
num = int(input("Input N : ")) 
for i in range(num): 
    nqueen([i], num) 
if count == 0: 
    print("No solution")

    글 제목: Algorithm_NQueen 수정 시간: 2018-09-12 08:20:00 +0000
